creator: Igor Chekachkov
caption: Kostya, Vanya and Vlad are resting in their room in dorm. They are filmmakers from Kyiv and was forced to move to Lviv after the invasion. They now live in dorm which inhabited by displaced people from eastern Ukraine, which is frequently under attack. 10 years ago I started my “Daily Life” series, documenting how people share a common space. Today I continue to take photographs of people who was forced to leave their home because of russian invasion to Ukraine and now share the space with people who host them, as well as other displaced.
